name: Lie Dectector
description:
◆Looking for a better lie detector? Want to trick your friends, family or even yourself? Don't know where to start? Check out Stop Lying!◆

Lie Dectector is the funniest detector for your iPhone and iPad. Just open the app, and place your thumb on the scanner and talk. App will tell you if the person is telling the truth or lying! What are you waiting for? Download Stop Lying NOW!!!

This app can make your life full of funs and happiness. You can use it to find out whether someone is telling the truth or not!

*** App is only for entertainment purposes and does not provide true lie detector functionality.***
